Name: Curry Express

Review Text: delicious food, very friendly and fast service, relatively cheap, big portion sizes! highly recommend

Name: Curry Express
Review Text: Very good food, very good staff. I ordered the tandoori chicken and the thali. Amazing food and reasonable price.

Name: Curry Express

Name: Curry Express
Review Text: What a rip off. All we had was 6 rotis, 1 lentil curry, 1 meat & cauliflour curry and  2 soft drinks. We was charged â‚¬45. My husbnd felt embarrassed asking why the price was so high considering its not even a proper restaurant. I think the owner took advantage of us, that we were visiting from abroad. Avoid

Name: Curry Express
Review Text:
One among the many helpful people we met in Amsterdam. Very sweet and friendly people running this small eatery but very tasty food.
Accidently found this place on our way to some other restaurant as we were late â€¦

Name: Curry Express
Review Text: Curry Express is a go to Pakistani ristorante in Amsterdam. Right in heart of Amsterdam, few minutes walk from central station. The owner is very kind and available. I had ordered biryani and it was mouthwatering mutton biryani i had in a â€¦

Name: Curry Express
Review Text: It's really good home cooking. Halal. If you want really spicey  they do it. The bartha  is really good. Grilled puree of eggplant. It's one of the best take aways. Anyone that gives this place a bad review  has no taste  buds.

Name: Curry Express
Review Text: We went to amsterdam for 6 days and out of 6 days we had dinner in the same restaurant. Ishaq bhai is really a nice guy and the taste is really good. Never felt like we are outside our home country. They are really nice people. He never â€¦

Name: Curry Express
Review Text: The most genuine Indian vegetarian food I've ever eaten; quality and flavor-wise. Interior isn't very inviting but wow what good food they make. Try it!

Name: Curry Express
Review Text: Last two times I order here, it was disgusting... The curry smelled and tasted sour. It wasn't fresh. They used to make good Indian food but now I stay far away!!

Name: Curry Express
Review Text: I had dinner at a Pakistani restaurant curry express  today, the meat was in a very old, it warmed up a long time ago, but it's too bad, it's too hard, we all have to go to the hospital..

Name: Curry Express
Review Text: One of the best halal Pakistani and Indian Food Just 10 mins walk from dam square highly recommended staff was nice and friendly

Review Text: It deserve 100 stars not only 5, great food, professional friendly chef in a very humble place. Cheap and fast service,,, simply felt home

Name: Curry Express
Review Text: Reasonable food. I like spicy food and this food was not very spicy. Slightly pricy.  Owner was humble. Halal food sign was displayed.

Name: Curry Express
Review Text: The food is delicious, and very reasonably priced. The place does not look very appealing, but it makes up for it by the taste of food, which feels really home-like.
